column4: I have an issue with preseed: netcfg works fine by getting all the network stuff from dhcp but still asking for a hostname. I try to add the line "d-i netcfg/get_hostname string unassigned-hostname" on the config file but no change. Any idea ?
any reason you're working without a hostname?
it retrieves the hostname but I still have to press enter :/
ooooh. i see. sorry, can't help. my problem with it is it doesn't set my default route :(
